Text:
WOW!  This is really a lovely print; looks and sounds frigg'n AWESOME!

Thanks so much mate!  If you don't mind my asking, if you could give me some idea as to where the source originates from.  The reason I'm curious is that I don't THINK the US release from EchoBridge is uncut like this one (and I doubt that they would do such a great job on it too  : )

I'm thinking that it probably is a European source, but I'm just curious as to where an uncut, full DTS print would originate from.

Appreciate it!!!
V8/A8. Thx for u/l! U rocks!!!!
